Touch Guitar

Arduino prototyping
Nov 2016-Present
Built With: Arduino, Wave Shield, Capacitive Touch Breakout Board
Building an Arduino-driven guitar with a laser-cut wooden body, and capacitive touch sensors. An audio file plays while strings are touched, transforming any user into an amazing guitar “player”

More pictures coming soon
